title: How to Make a Chocolate Pound Cake

steps.headline: Cream butter, sugar, shortening, and vanilla until light and fluffy.
Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt; add alternately with milk to creamed mixture.
Pour into greased microwave Bundt pan.
steps.description: Microwave on high for about 18 to 20 minutes, or until cake pulls away from sides of pan and cake tester comes out clean.

steps.headline: Turn 1/2 turn every 5 minutes of cooking time.
Let stand 30 minutes on wooden board; remove from pan.
Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar, or frost as desired.

text: Cream butter, sugar, shortening, and vanilla until light and fluffy.  Add eggs; beat well.  Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt; add alternately with milk to creamed mixture.  Beat until well blended.  Pour into greased microwave Bundt pan. Microwave on high for about 18 to 20 minutes, or until cake pulls away from sides of pan and cake tester comes out clean. Turn 1/2 turn every 5 minutes of cooking time.  Let stand 30 minutes on wooden board; remove from pan.  Cool completely.  Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar, or frost as desired.  Enjoy!
